1527284582_1Kma1Pz9kBSHmDtK1iYtHTox14Edm.body: Why don't you build yourself a tiny house?  Do all the things you plan to, sell the goods, save money and build your own home.  You'll feel the self esteem and empowerment that comes with the greater independence.  Then do the same and buy yourself your own plot of land.
